text: The 2003 Individual Speedway Junior World Championship ==World final== * 13 September 2003 * Kumla, Kumla Speedway Martin Smolinski has replace the injured Krzysztof Kasprzak (3rd in semi-final A). ==See also== 2003 World I J Category:2003 in Swedish sport Category:Speedway competitions in Sweden
title: 2003 Individual Speedway Junior World Championship
